name: Albuquerque
description:
Mitch has arrived in Albuquerque, concerned about his father's well being. What will he find? Is this the beginning of a grand father-son adventure? Play to find out.

Made for the Godot Wild Jam 31 (https://itch.io/jam/godot-wild-jam-31).

All of the sound effects are from https://freesound.org

Music by https://bensound.com
